酒槽: (しゅそう) - sake cask; sake tun
酒樽: (さかだる) - wine cask or barrel
酒機嫌: (さけきげん) - one's mood when drinking alcohol
酒気を帯びる: (しゅきをおびる) - to tie one on; to get drunk
酒気帯び運転: (しゅきおびうんてん) - {law} drunk driving; driving under the influence (of alcohol); DUI; legal category based on blood alcohol content
酒池肉林: (しゅちにくりん) - (yoji) sumptuous feast; debauch
酒浸し: (さかびたし) - liquor-soaked; continuous drinking/daily drinking/binge drinking
酒浸り: (さかびたり) - liquor-soaked; continuous drinking/daily drinking/binge drinking
酒焼け: (さけやけ) - feeling of a throat burned by alcohol; effect of alcohol on the voice
酒癖: (しゅへき) - drinking habits; drunken behavior; drunken behaviour
酒癖が悪い: (さけぐせがわるい) - being a bad drunk
酒癖の悪い: (さけぐせのわるい) - being a bad drunk
酒盃: (さかづき) - sake cup; cup for alcoholic beverages
酒盗: (しゅとう) - dish of pickled skipjack tuna entrails sometimes mixed with sake, honey, mirin and onions (specialty of Kochi Prefecture)
酒石: (しゅせき) - tartar (as formed during the fermentation of wine, etc.)
酒石英: (しゅせきえい) - cream of tartar; potassium hydrogen tartrate
酒石酸水素カリウム: (しゅせきさんすいそカリウム) - potassium bitartrate; potassium hydrogen tartrate; cream of tartar
酒税: (しゅぜい) - liquor tax; tax on alcohol
酒精: (しゅせい) - (ethyl) alcohol; spirits of wine
酒肉: (しゅうにく) - alcohol and meat; food and drink.
酒臭い: (さけくさい) - reeking of liquor; smelling of alcohol
酒色: (しゅしょく) - wine and women; sensual pleasures; dissipation
酒蒸: (さかむし) - seafood seasoned with salt and sake then steamed
酒蒸し: (さかむし) - seafood seasoned with salt and sake then steamed
酒蔵: (さかぐら) - sake brewery; wine cellar; bar/bar-room
酒虫: (しゅちゅう) - (from 'Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio', 1740) mythical spirit residing in a person's body that generates a desire to drink (also said to turn water into alcohol)
酒造場: (しゅぞうじょう) - brewery; distillery; winery
酒造業: (しゅぞうぎょう) - brewing; distilling; wine-making
酒造米: (しゅぞうまい) - rice for sake brewing; brewers' rice
酒量: (しゅりょう) - amount of drink; one's drinking capacity
酒飲み: (さけのみ) - (heavy) drinker; drunkard; tippler; boozer
酔い: (yoi) - embriaguez, intoxicação; enjoo, mal-estar de viagem
酔いが回る: (よいがまわる) - to get drunk; to become tipsy
酔いが覚める: (よいがさめる) - to sober up
酔いしれる: (よいしれる) - to be befuddled (with drink)/to be intoxicated; to be infatuated/to be entranced/to be carried away
酔いつぶす: (よいつぶす) - to drink someone down; to drink someone under the table
酔いつぶれる: (よいつぶれる) - to drink oneself dead drunk; to drink oneself unconscious
酔いを覚ます: (よいをさます) - to sober up
酔い潰す: (よいつぶす) - to drink someone down; to drink someone under the table
酔い潰れる: (よいつぶれる) - to drink oneself dead drunk; to drink oneself unconscious
酔い痴れる: (よいしれる) - to be befuddled (with drink)/to be intoxicated; to be infatuated/to be entranced/to be carried away
酔い覚め: (よいざめ) - recovering from intoxication; sobering up
酔い醒め: (よいざめ) - recovering from intoxication; sobering up
酔う: (よう) - to get drunk/to become intoxicated; to feel sick (e.g. in a vehicle)/to become nauseated; to be elated/to be exalted/to be spellbound/to be in raptures
酔っ払い運転: (よっぱらいうんてん) - drunk driving
酔わす: (よわす) - to get (someone) drunk/to inebriate/to intoxicate; to charm/to enchant
酔わせる: (よわせる) - to get (someone) drunk/to inebriate/to intoxicate; to charm/to enchant
酔拳: (すいけん) - Drunken Fist; Drunken Boxing
酔歩: (すいほ) - drunken stagger/tottering gait; drunkard's walk/random walk
酔歩蹣跚: (すいほまんさん) - (yoji) tipsy lurch; reeling (staggering) gait
酔狂: (すいきょう) - whim; vagary; capriciousness; eccentricity
酔生夢死: (すいせいむし) - (yoji) idling one's life away
酔眼: (すいがん) - bleary or drunken eyes
酔眼もうろう: (すいがんもうろう) - (yoji) (with) one's eyes blurred from drinking; with drunken eyes; dazed by wine
酔眼朦朧: (すいがんもうろう) - (yoji) (with) one's eyes blurred from drinking; with drunken eyes; dazed by wine
酔興: (すいきょう) - whim; vagary; capriciousness; eccentricity
酔芙蓉: (すいふよう) - cotton rosemallow (Hibiscus mutabilis cv. Versicolor); Confederate rose
酔象: (すいぞう) - drunken elephant piece, used in some variants of shogi
酔顔: (すいがん) - drunken face; drunken expression
酖溺: (たんでき) - indulgence (e.g. in alcohol, women, etc.); debauchery/dissipation
